text: Tuffé-Val-de-la-Chéronne is a commune. It is found in the Pays de la Loire region in the Sarthe department in the west of France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2016 and consists of the former communes of Tuffé (the seat) and Saint-Hilaire-le-Lierru.Arrêté préfectoral 29 September 2015 == References == Category:2016 establishments in France Category:Communes in Sarthe
title: Tuffé-Val-de-la-Chéronne
